html:
5.31.18  12:08 pm   how to get motivated and stay motivated for a project? i really want to start a project but i have problems with motivation. i'm also a perfectionist, so i think that's the reason i procrastinate a lot and end up losing motivation. i'm just really scared that my projects will end up different from my original vision and expectation.

     if you start with very much shorter and simpler projects, that will lower the stakes and allow you to finish them, and you will also learn very quickly everything you need to know about projects, procedures, and yourself

5.31.18  10:33 am   What do you think is special?

     you

5.31.18  9:59 am   do you prefer numbers or letters?

      i prefer numbers, and it drives me crazy how everyone keeps using letters all the time

5.31.18  9:45 am   what do you think of the UK?/ Have you ever been to the UK and if so did you like it there? (also hi I really like your content and really funny bye) 

      i think it serves as a wonderful blueprint, for how to unite a kingdom

5.31.18  9:42 am   is it ok to be unsocial?

     you will have to ask your peer group

5.31.18  9:33 am   what lies on the edge of the universe?

     the entire universe is edge. this is edge universe

5.31.18  9:07 am   Favorite sandwich?

      the sandwich sandwich

5.31.18  8:55 am   why people make tea

     for drinking and beverage purposes

5.31.18  7:35 am   can i be famous for meeting a non-existent person?/thing

     it's plausible

5.31.18  5:49 am   is music the only thing you do??

      i also make videos, to go with the music. or, for a twist, sometimes i make a video and then make music to go with it

5.31.18  5:04 am   Where did you get the idea to do those telephone-like jingly bell trills in a few of your songs and jingles?

     from telephones, i suppose

5.31.18  4:33 am   is it cool to be a duck?

     yes

5.31.18  3:33 am   why not do the most ambitious thing on the list?

     oh, that's the spirit

5.31.18  1:43 am   What's better: a hot 2-5 or a crisp tritone sub?

     how about something different that seems to get the same job done and yet under closer examination is neither of those two things, causing you to question the entire institution and reality itself

5.31.18  12:33 am   how do you sort your lyrics? 

     alphabetically, by word. for example, aardvark, actual, admin, algorhythm, and so on

5.31.18  12:31 am   How to make a well-formed song?

      you'll have to just try forming them different ways and eventually you will figure out which way you think is well

5.31.18  12:17 am   are we there yet

     here

5.30.18  11:12 pm   How do you deal with being slightly out of tune all the time, despite being able to hear all the pitches clearly in your head? Like, I can think myself a good solo or whatever, but then when it comes to sing or even play it on piano I can't do it seemlessly and then I forget the solo while I'm trying to sing or play it.

      i'm confused, is this a question about tuning, or memory?

5.30.18  10:44 pm   should i get a harmonica?

     sure

5.30.18  9:46 pm   Can you teach me how to love?

     i will try

     step 1 is start it!

     i believe in communication

      yes but they are going to change more

     because life is too interesting

     the bell!

      wild and crazy

     dynamic

      use it as a weapon?

     oh, that's true

      they are very advanced

     oh you need to get one of those instrument shrinkers

     you might have to listen to them

5.30.18  4:52 pm   how many seconds in a day?

     somewhere near 86,400

5.30.18  4:52 pm   How long do I sleep?

      medium

5.30.18  4:31 pm   have you got answers?

     yes, and questions

5.30.18  3:23 pm   Ice pants. Thoughts?

     not at this time

5.30.18  2:08 pm   on songs.html the "chips (sponsored)" entry says it is 5 seconds long but the mp3 is 11 seconds long. is this: an error, an intentional decision with a deeper meaning, or false advertising

     it was designed as a looping video, of 5 seconds. there is only 5 seconds of content, but on the non-looping sites, it would be a little unfair to let it go around only once

5.30.18  2:02 pm   What's the most difficult thing to master?

      something you don't like or enjoy

      i can never quite predict

     no but it seems to be following me

     promote yourself

     i've seen the emojis, not the movie

5.30.18  12:42 pm   Is real-life real?

     hold on let me perform some calculations

     sharing secrets

     there is a prize for best person

5.30.18  9:18 am   you got any spicy creative thoughts at the moment?

     sure

     you'll have to take another vacation

     usually not

     yes
